Module Breakout
Package breakout.bricks

Class TemplateBrick

java.lang.Object
breakout.bricks.TemplateBrick
Direct Known Subclasses:
BossBrick, CementBrick, ClayBrick, DiamondBrick, SteelBrick, TitaniumBrick
public abstract class TemplateBrick extends Object
Abstract class of bricks, used to create bricks
